image 600 400
clear 0 0 0
color 255 255 255
line 300 0 300 400
line 0 0 600 400
line 0 200 600 200
line 0 400 600 0
color 255 255 0
line 0 400 600 200
line 0 200 600 0
color 0 255 255
line 0 0 600 200
line 0 200 600 400
color 255 0 0
line 150 400 300 0
line 150 0 300 400
color 0 255 0
line 300 0 450 400
line 300 400 450 0
polygon 3 200 200 300 200 250 300
rect 200 200 400 300
save texte.ppm
